About Me

Allow me to tell a few things...

BIO

Technophile, code loving guy. i'm very passionate about computers and software development born and raised in Venezuela moved to Argentina. I have skills in routing/switching with Cisco Technologies and also good at teamwork.

Materiales Oleka Sa de CV

Total redesing of Website and Webmaster for a short period of time.

Evcon

I did some management on the central network station for this company, my job was to check if every client was getting their connection to the internet.

Globo Telecom
